problem.markdown:
>> If a 2 dimensional array \(A\) is stored in a column major fashion in memory, then \(A[i, j]\) and \(A[i+1, j+1]\) are <<
( ) next to each other (x) more than one memory location apart

multiplechoiceresponse.label: If a 2 dimensional array \(A\) is stored in a column major fashion in memory, then \(A[i, j]\) and \(A[i+1, j+1]\) are

choicegroup.choice: more than one memory location apart
